mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.INSTITUTIONAL_NAME as institutionalName, a.BSINESS_DESCRIPTION as bsinessDescription, a.BUSINESS_NAME as businessName, a.WEBSITE_URL as websiteUrl, a.ISTITUTIONAL_NATURE as istitutionalNature, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_INSTITUTIONAL( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , INSTITUTIONAL_NAME , BSINESS_DESCRIPTION , BUSINESS_NAME , WEBSITE_URL , ISTITUTIONAL_NATURE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{institutionalName} , #{bsinessDescription} , #{businessName} , #{websiteUrl} , #{istitutionalNature} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_INSTITUTIONAL
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
INSTITUTIONAL_NAME ,
BSINESS_DESCRIPTION ,
BUSINESS_NAME ,
WEBSITE_URL ,
ISTITUTIONAL_NATURE ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE

#{bsinessDescription} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_INSTITUTIONAL
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
INSTITUTIONAL_NAME = #{institutionalName} ,
BSINESS_DESCRIPTION = #{bsinessDescription} ,
BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName} ,
WEBSITE_URL = #{websiteUrl} ,
ISTITUTIONAL_NATURE = #{istitutionalNature} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_INSTITUTIONAL( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , INSTITUTIONAL_NAME , BSINESS_DESCRIPTION , BUSINESS_NAME , WEBSITE_URL , ISTITUTIONAL_NATURE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.institutionalName} , #{item.bsinessDescription} , #{item.businessName} , #{item.websiteUrl} , #{item.istitutionalNature} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_INSTITUTIONAL SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , INSTITUTIONAL_NAME = #{item.institutionalName} , BSINESS_DESCRIPTION = #{item.bsinessDescription} , BUSINESS_NAME = #{item.businessName} , WEBSITE_URL = #{item.websiteUrl} , ISTITUTIONAL_NATURE = #{item.istitutionalNature} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_INSTITUTIONAL SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , INSTITUTIONAL_NAME = #{institutionalName} , BSINESS_DESCRIPTION = #{bsinessDescription} , BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName} , WEBSITE_URL = #{websiteUrl} , ISTITUTIONAL_NATURE = #{istitutionalNature} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_INSTITUTIONAL a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
